name: cut-order
description: Like unix's cut(1) except columns can be reordered

scripts.bench: npm run generate-fixtures && echo 'cut' && time cut -f 3,2,1 ./test/3-col.tsv > /dev/null && echo '' && echo 'cut-order' && time node bin/cut-order -f 3,2,1 ./test/3-col.tsv > /dev/null

author: Drew Petersen <kirbysayshi@gmail.com>
